ValidationRule.description: Ensures that only one role is chosen for a non-trust household.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Account.Type, "Trust" )) && ((IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Client"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Child"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Other important family member"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Trust"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Employee"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Mortgage borrower"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Deceased Client"),1,0)) > 1)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only one role can be chosen.
